text: Myristica lowiana is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Singapore, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica lowiana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
